input_email_body:
Subject: Problem with MacBook Air During Presentation

During a presentation, my MacBook Air's monitor went black You can reach me at liuwei@business.cn.. It's possible that the issue is due to a overloaded RAID-Controller. Restarting the device and checking connections did not resolve the problem My name is David Kim.. I would appreciate your help in fixing this issue.
